channel.title: Late April Facilitation (Ironsworn, Blood in the Arena, Dream Apart, Great American Novel)
channel.description:
I need to get my feet in the water, but diving in slowly before my rather intense May games. So I will be putting the following forward for the two last weekends of April
These events are scheduled to run for 3-4 hours. It will be recorded assuming all parties agree.
[The Gauntlet Inclusivity Policy](https://www.gauntlet-rpg.com/the-inclusivity-policy.html) will be in play and safety tools ([Script Change](http://tinyurl.com/nphed7m) and [X-Card](http://tinyurl.com/x-card-rpg)) will be in use.
[date=2019-04-20 time=14:00:00 timezone="Europe/Berlin"]: [Ironsworn COOP: Tales of the Iron Gauntlet Brotherhood](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-La0laU7OUf-jymF7mId)
[date=2019-04-21 time=14:00:00 timezone="Europe/Berlin"] : [Blood in the Arena: I Have Made But One Mistake](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-La0hNjF0zwbm4BE0IMv)
[date=2019-04-27 time=14:00:00 timezone="Europe/Berlin"] : [Dream Apart](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-La0cFyVkHJlnIrPOl68)
[date=2019-04-28 time=14:00:00 timezone="Europe/Berlin"]: [Great American Novel: Iliad](https://gauntlet-hangouts.firebaseapp.com/event-detail/-La0_2Zvz1rprwHTLDe_)

item.title: Late April Facilitation (Ironsworn, Blood in the Arena, Dream Apart, Great American Novel)

item.description:
@Ludovico_Alves wrote:

I need to get my feet in the water, but diving in slowly before my rather intense May games. So I will be putting the following forward for the two last weekends of April

These events are scheduled to run for 3-4 hours. It will be recorded assuming all parties agree.

The Gauntlet Inclusivity Policy will be in play and safety tools (Script Change and X-Card) will be in use.
